examples: Having recently been released from prison, he didn't know what to do with his newfound freedom .

definitions.definition: The lack of a specific constraint , or of constraints in general; a state of being free, unconstrained .
examples: Freedom of speech is a basic democratic value.
People in our city enjoy many freedoms .
Every child has a right to freedom from fear and freedom from want.

definitions.definition: The right or privilege of unrestricted use or access
Improper familiarity; violation of the rules of decorum .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The state of being free .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) The lack of a specific constraint , or of constraints in general; a state of being free, unconstrained .
The right or privilege of unrestricted use or access
Improper familiarity; violation of the rules of decorum .
